summary: My first mod/enb preset upload so be nice! lol, im seriousely nervous over here! haha
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS]

Feel free to endorse if you think its good :)


VERSION 279 NOW AVAILABLE!!!

SUNSPRITE SHADER
BRIGHTER NIGHTS
AND A FEW OTHER FIXES




[i]im actually pretty happy with this version :)
[/i]AND
i ran around with FOV 81, forced weather in areas i shouldnt(lol) did crazy backflips,stood on my head...and experienced no fps drop..
EXCEPT in morthal swamp a little...i hate that place :)

i SINCERELY hope this works for everyone

ENJOY! 


[/font][/b][font=Comic Sans MS][b]
[/b][/font][b]THANKS! :)[/b] 

[img]http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b429/nrngreen/enb%20279%20girl_zpsv2nkquzr.jpg[/img]

[b][font=Comic Sans MS]Blazing Trails Enb with sweetfx

My first ever preset!! dont even know if this is going to come out right as I have never uploaded anything before...ANYWAYS haha :) i have spent the better part of 2 years...yes, 2 lol. Trying to eliminate stutter from my game, while using an enb, and the other day i thought WHY DONT I JUST GIVE IT A GO AND MAKE A PRESET??!!! so that is why I'm here :). I apologise if it aint good, I really tried. I am welcome to any criticism or advice anyone would like to give :)

Not really sure if i talk about the required mods for the enb to look as intended now...SO I WILL ANYWAY :)

IF ITS NIGHT AND THE AURORAS AREN'T OUT BRING A TORCH!!!! it gets dark as balls outside lol. :) just a heads up 

[img]http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b429/nrngreen/MORNING%20WOOD%20AFTER_zpsyhzcyvlc.jpg[/img]




REQUIRED mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water two- Isoku[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?]Watercooler for ENB and Realistic Water two[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423/?]Pure Weathers- Laast[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced lights and fx with interior enhancer- anamorfus

[/url]NOT required but it's a sick looking horse :)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25097/?]Blaze of Eventide- Alek[/url]( its the horse in a couple of my screenshots so thought I would include it )

[img]http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b429/nrngreen/2015-10-19_00060_zpscyuzs1i0.jpg[/img]


SPECIAL THANKS/CREDITS:

Phinix- For his sun sprite shader :)(in version 279)[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24235/?]Phinix Natural enb[/url]
Skyrimtuner- DOF effect
Boris- For everything ENB :)
CeeJay-Sweetfx
Paganmetalfan,Laast,Alek,Isoku and anamorfus for makin my screenshots purrty! :) lol
AND OF COURSE -the nexus community for being ...FABULOUS!! :)
[/font][/b][/center]
author: Bandit1232
